title: Epictetus on How to Be Free
description:
Today’s episode features an excerpt from Anthony Long’s translation of Epictetus How to Be Free: An Ancient Guide to the Stoic Life as part of Princeton University Press’s Anient Wisdom For Modern Readers series. 

✉️ Sign up for the Daily Stoic email: https://dailystoic.com/dailyemail

🏛Check out the Daily Stoic Store for Stoic inspired products, signed books, and more.
